nodes.text: The Braxant sector was in the Outer Rim Territories. Planets in the Braxant sector included Sartinaynian (Bastion), final capital of the Imperial Remnant. The sector also contained Rimcee Station as and the resort The Edge of the Galaxy.

During the events surrounding the Caamas Document Crisis, the sector was governed by Moff Vilim Disra. At this time it was defended by the Braxant Sector Fleet, a fleet including thirteen Imperial-class Star Destroyers.
Following Disra's duplicity in that crisis, the young Moff Ephin Sarreti took his place.
